meanings.definition: A vertical block at the end of a roof tile, often decorated.
meanings.sent1: The antefixes added a touch of elegance to the roof.
meanings.sent2: The ancient temple had intricate antefixes along its roofline.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to balance on the antefixes, thinking they were steps.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared like the intricate antefixes on the temple.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the golden antefixes, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A decorative element used to cover the ends of roof tiles.
meanings.sent1: The colorful antefixes brightened up the plain roof tiles.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully selected matching antefixes for the roof design.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined the antefixes as tiny hats for the roof tiles.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed under the protective embrace of the antefixes.
meanings.sent5: The wind whistled through the gaps between the delicate antefixes.

meanings.definition: A carved ornament at the top of a building.
meanings.sent1: The intricate antefixes on the cathedral were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor spent hours perfecting the details of the antefixes.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons perched on the antefixes, mistaking them for statues.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached as high as the towering antefixes on the building.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast a mysterious glow on the ancient antefixes.
